data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Romblon, Philippines to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 33,395 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Romblon, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 29,890 people in the state of Romblon who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Romblon, Philippines.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Romblon who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Hanunoo people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 5,405 believers in Romblon, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Romblon to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Romblon against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

location.name: Romblon
location.cities_list: Romblon, Odiongan, Taclobo, Concepcion, San Agustin
